Nov. 26, 1978 D City of Leicester Brass Band Festival (Youth Section)
City of Leicester Brass Band Festival (Youth Section) 50 Own Choice Test Piece Contest City of Leicester Brass Band Festival city-of-leicester-festival-youth-section
De Montfort Hall, Leicester, Leicestershire, England, UK Prizes - 1st £30 and trophy, 2nd £20 and trophy, 3rd 10 and cup. 8 bands competed.
Sept. 12, 2013, 10:18 a.m. March 29, 2017, 10:01 a.m.
1 Loughborough Youth Band Bud Fisher
2 Crewe Co-op Youth David Moulton
3 Chalford Youth Ken Wear
4 Brodsworth Colliery Junior P.R. Fisher
Unknown Result Benwhat Youth Enoch Jackson
